mn9:1.3: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
mn9:1.5: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
mn9:2.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhamman”ti?
mn9:2.3: “Duratopi kho mayam, avuso, agaccheyyama ayasmato sariputtassa santike etassa bhasitassa atthamannatum.
mn9:2.4: Sadhu vatayasmantamyeva sariputtam patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho.
mn9:2.6: “Tena hi, avuso, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn9:2.7: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
mn9:3.1: “Yato kho, avuso, ariyasavako akusalanca pajanati, akusalamulanca pajanati, kusalanca pajanati, kusalamulanca pajanati—
mn9:3.2: ettavatapi kho, avuso, ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhammam.
mn9:4.1: Katamam panavuso, akusalam, katamam akusalamulam, katamam kusalam, katamam kusalamulam?
mn9:4.2: Panatipato kho, avuso, akusalam, adinnadanam akusalam, kamesumicchacaro akusalam, musavado akusalam, pisuna vaca akusalam, pharusa vaca akusalam, samphappalapo akusalam, abhijjha akusalam, byapado akusalam, micchaditthi akusalam—
mn9:5.2: Lobho akusalamulam, doso akusalamulam, moho akusalamulam—
mn9:6.2: Panatipata veramani kusalam, adinnadana veramani kusalam, kamesumicchacara veramani kusalam, musavada veramani kusalam, pisunaya vacaya veramani kusalam, pharusaya vacaya veramani kusalam, samphappalapa veramani kusalam, anabhijjha kusalam, abyapado kusalam, sammaditthi kusalam—
mn9:7.2: Alobho kusalamulam, adoso kusalamulam, amoho kusalamulam—
mn9:8.1: Yato kho, avuso, ariyasavako evam akusalam pajanati, evam akusalamulam pajanati, evam kusalam pajanati, evam kusalamulam pajanati, so sabbaso raganusayam pahaya, patighanusayam pativinodetva, ‘asmi’ti ditthimananusayam samuhanitva, avijjam pahaya vijjam uppadetva, dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti—
mn9:8.2: ettavatapi kho, avuso, ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhamman”ti.

mn9:68.2: “siya panavuso, annopi pariyayo yatha ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhamman”ti?
mn9:69.2: Yato kho, avuso, ariyasavako asavanca pajanati, asavasamudayanca pajanati, asavanirodhanca pajanati, asavanirodhagaminim patipadanca pajanati—
mn9:69.3: ettavatapi kho, avuso, ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhammam.
mn9:70.1: Katamo panavuso, asavo, katamo asavasamudayo, katamo asavanirodho, katama asavanirodhagamini patipadati?
mn9:70.4: Avijjasamudaya asavasamudayo, avijjanirodha asavanirodho, ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo asavanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
mn9:71.1: Yato kho, avuso, ariyasavako evam asavam pajanati, evam asavasamudayam pajanati, evam asavanirodham pajanati, evam asavanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, so sabbaso raganusayam pahaya, patighanusayam pativinodetva, ‘asmi’ti ditthimananusayam samuhanitva, avijjam pahaya vijjam uppadetva, dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti—
mn9:71.2: ettavatapi kho, avuso, ariyasavako sammaditthi hoti, ujugatassa ditthi, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato, agato imam saddhamman”ti.
mn9:71.4: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
